Theme: Unfortunate Love

column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:
For the lovers of all time,
who can break the spell of romance?
column6:
For lovers caught in eternal time,
who can break the spell of romance?

My Lady,

column3: 奴才再也不能伺候小主了
column6: I can no longer be in your service.

column3: 怎么了 有话好好说
column6: What happened? Calm yourself down.

column3: 刚才内务府公公前来传话

column6: The Household Department just came to deliver a message.
Concubine Beauté has specially requested me to work in her palace.

column3: 丽嫔娘娘那儿也是个好去处
column6: I see.
It's not bad for you to serve Her Highness Concubine Beauté.

column3: 收拾了东西即刻就去吧

column6: You may pack and leave right away.
Thank you, My Lady.
I really wish I could stay.

column3: 奴才走后 小主您要保重身子呀
column6: After I leave, please take care of your health.
Jade,
call everyone in.
Yes.

column3: 我这一病 快两个月了
column6: I have been sick for almost two months already.

column3: 也实在无需这么多人来伺候
column6:
I prefer a quiet healing environment
and my palace is overstaffed for that.

column3: 所以今儿找你们来只问一句话

column6: I've summoned all of you to ask one question only:

column3: 去浣碧那里领一锭银子便可走人
column6:
If anyone wishes to leave the Palace of Pearl Jade,
you may take a sycee from Jade and leave.

column3: 大家还不快恭喜康公公和印公公

column6:
We all should congratulate Mr. Kang and Mr. Yin
on their new positions with Concubine Beauté.

column3: 待会儿收拾完东西就走
小主素日待康公公不薄
column6: They will pack and leave today.

column3: 康公公也巴儿狗似的殷勤得很
column6:
My Lady has treated you kindly, Mr. Kang,
and you have been as loyal as a dog.

column3: 怎么如今攀了高枝说走就走

column6:
But when you see a higher branch to jump to,
you can forget about your mistress, can't you?

column3: 流朱姑娘 您错怪我了
column6: Vermilion, you misunderstood.

column3: 可丽嫔娘娘指名让我过去
column6:
I only have the heart to serve My Lady,
but Concubine Beauté asked for me.

column3: 奴才我也是身不由己呀
column6: I cannot be where my heart wants to be.
Your heart?

column3: 还有牛不喝水强按头的道理
column6:
I never knew that you could force a cow to drink
by pressing its head.

column3: 既然你一心想伺候小主
那么这份忠心倒辜负不得
column6:
Since you are devoted to serving My Lady,
your loyalty must not be compromised.

column3: 不如你去辞了丽嫔娘娘
你是个一身不侍二主的忠仆
column6:
Why don't you decline and tell Her Highness that
a loyal servant won't serve two masters?

column3: 丽嫔娘娘自然不会怪你
我呢 也立即向您斟茶认错
column6:
I'm sure Concubine Beauté will understand.
And I will apologize to you over tea.

column3: 只怕是有人口不应心罢了
column6: I'm afraid your mouth doesn't say what your heart wants to.
Vermilion.

Mr. Kang has great loyalty.
It doesn't matter who he serves.
Jade, give him the sycee.
Farewell, Mr. Kang.
And you too, Mr. Yin.

column3: 以后多学着你师傅的忠心
column6: You must learn from your shifu's loyalty.
It goes a long way.
Thank you, My Lady.

column3: 今日还有得银子给你们
column6: Go with them if you wish!
While you can still get the money.

If you make a request after today,
My Lady will send you to the Department of Penalty.
Don't think twice!

column3: 奴才愚笨 怕是伺候不好小主
column6: I'm afraid I am incompetent to serve you, My Lady.

column3: 奴婢愿跟随小主 绝无二心
column6: My Lady, I am willing to follow you without a second thought.
Me as well, My Lady.
I am indebted to your favors, My Lady.
I'd never dare to betray you.

column3: 奴才的哥哥病在四执库没人理会
column6: Why is that?

column3: 若不是小主在病中仍挂念着

column6:
When my brother was desperately sick,
you sent Dr. Wen to treat him.

column3: 奴才兄弟受小主这等大恩
column6: Without you, my brother wouldn't still be alive.

We owe you a great debt.
I will spare no effort in my service.
If I can't pay you back in this life,
I will become a black ox that takes you to the Pure Land.
Stop it.

I mean every word I say.
I would never lie to My Lady.
Enough of the bows.

column3: 还得找温太医再来一次
column6:
If you break your forehead,
I will have to ask Dr. Wen to help you again.

I do not want the outsiders to keep saying that
everyone in my palace is weak and sick.

column3: 小允子在廊上上夜总是受冻
column6:
It's been cold at night.
Xiao-Yunzi is always freezing on guard.

column3: 给他备一条厚一点的被子

column6: Prepare a thicker blanket for him.
Yes.
Thank you, My Lady.

All of your days have not been easy,
following an unwell and neglected concubine.
But you still treat me well.
I don't know how I can repay your kindness.

For as long as I live,
I won't let your days be difficult.
Thank you, My Lady.

column3: 连好一点的炭都不送来
column6:
The Household Department is so dismissive.
Because of My Lady's status, they didn't send good charcoal.
Not so loud.

My Lady is unwell.
She will feel worse if she hears it.
Is the water boiling?
Yes.

column3: 这个炭怕是用不了了 烟太大
column6:
This charcoal is smoky.
I'm afraid we can't use it indoors.

column3: 给小主放到铺里暖和些
column6: I'll go fill a hot water bottle for My Lady to keep her bed warm.
Aye, go ahead.

column3: 二位小主吉祥 小主吉祥
column6: Peace to My Ladies.

column3: 天真是冷了 你们小主倒好睡
column6:
It's very cold these days,
the perfect weather for Attendant Sourire to sleep more.

column3: 沈贵人吉祥 安答应吉祥
column6: Peace to Lady Shen and Companion An.
It's freezing in here.

column3: 怎么样 你好些了吗 眉姐姐
column6:
- Are you feeling better?
- Meizhuang.

- Sourire.
- Lingrong.

- Your hands are cold.
- Have you been better?
Just the same.

column3: 姐姐这个玉钗颜色极好
column6: You can't go on like this.

I like the color of your hairpin.
It must be a gift from His Majesty.

column3: 眉姐姐现在圣眷正浓呢
column6: Meizhuang is in high favor now.

column3: 天凉了就更不宜养病了
column6:
Your palace is secluded,
and the cold makes it even less suitable for recuperation.

column3: 我给你带了几篓银炭来

column6:
I brought you several baskets of silver charcoal.
It should last for a while.

column3: 我见槿汐烧的炭盆都是用的黑炭
column6: I saw Jinxi was burning dark charcoal.

column3: 定是内务府那帮奴才使坏
column6: The Household Department must be giving you trouble.

column3: 我总要禀明了皇后才是
column6: I have to report this to the Empress.

column3: 我久病失势 难免他们不周到些
column6: Inconsideration is natural for a favorless concubine.
Let's save ourselves from one more trouble.

column3: 他们也不敢十分怠慢我
column6: Because you're in favor, they don't dare neglect me too much.

column3: 再说你们不也给我送来了吗
column6: Besides, you two have already brought me some charcoal.

column3: 雪中送炭的情谊可比什么都可贵
column6:
Nothing can compare to the kindness
of sending charcoal on a snowy day.

column3: 连康禄海那样没心肝的东西走了
column6:
It's because you have a tolerant mind.
You even put up with that heartless Kang Luhai.

When a heartless person is out of sight,
he's out of my mind.
What do you mean?

column3: 奴才不在于多只在于忠心与否
column6: The loyalty of the servants outweighs the number.

column3: 是啊 看来回去我也得留心
column6: Indeed, I will be careful about mine as well.

column3: 妹妹不懂得如何驾驭下人
column6: And you too, Lingrong.

Thank you for your reminder.
I will learn to manage my servants.

column3: 只是甄姐姐这病长久未愈
也是因为病中太过操心的缘故
column6:
Sourire is having a slow recovery
probably because of her troubled mind.
I'm all right. What about you?
Have you served His Majesty?
Why would His Majesty even remember me?
Don't overthink.

column3: 皇上一时顾不上后宫也是常有的
column6:
With the warfare in the Northwest,
it's natural that His Majesty overlooks the harem.
You will serve His Majesty sooner or later.

column3: 听说皇上十来天都没进后宫了
column6:
I understand. I heard that His Majesty
has not visited the harem for over ten days.

column3: 是啊 太后知道了又要念叨呢
column6: Yes, the Empress Dowager will be chattering if she finds out.

column3: 我知道天冷了 要抱暖炉子
有了这个暖炉套子便不会烫着手
column6: In this weather, I know you'll be using hot water bottles.

column3: 就连夜给姐姐做了一个
column6:
I made this cover overnight
so your hands wouldn't get burned.

This flower-patterned textile was our welcome gift
when entering the palace.

column3: 做个暖炉套子岂不可惜了
column6: Isn't it a pity to have it made into a cover?
Not at all.

column3: 拿得出手的东西送给姐姐
column6: I don't have anything presentable.
It's worthwhile if you like it.
I do.

column3: 各处装点得怎么样我得先走了
column6:
The new year is near,
so the Empress sent me to check the decorations in the harem.
I have to go now.

column3: 那妹妹也改日再来看姐姐
column6: Of course, be careful when you walk.
I will also leave and visit you another day.

column3: 就别出来走动了 免得冻着
column6:
You may not be used to the cold.
Don't go outside if you don't have to.

column3: 没关系 我喜欢和姐姐们在一起
column6: It's all right. I like spending time with you both.

column3: 槿汐 送两位小主出去

column6: Jinxi, please walk them out.
Yes.
Take care and feel better soon.
My Lady, it's time for your medicine.
How much longer do you have to take this?

column3: 毕竟是药三分毒 只怕伤身哪
column6: After all, any medicine can do some harm to your health.

column3: 只是不让我的病好得那么快罢了

column6:
This formula only slows down my recovery.
There's no need to worry.
Did anyone find out?

column3: 只有我和流朱 没有旁人知道
column6: Just Vermilion and I. No one else knows.

column3: 为何连沈贵人和安答应也瞒着
column6: But why would you even hide this from Lady Shen and Companion An?

column3: 正因我与她们情同姐妹

column6:
I see them as my sisters.
That's why it's best they don't know.

There is a chance this may come to light one day.
If that happens, they won't be implicated.
Lunar, you never have to make the trip here.

column3: 还不快拿椅子来请姑娘坐
column6: Please have a seat. Bring a chair quickly.

column3: 刚替贵人送东西去碎玉轩
column6: It's all right.

column3: 顺道来领这个月的月例
column6:
Lady Shen just had some items sent to Attendant Sourire.
So I stopped by for this month's stipend.

column3: 把沈贵人宫里的月例银子包好
column6: Go pack the stipend for Lady Shen's palace.
Lunar is waiting.
Yes.
You came from the Palace of Pearl Jade?

column3: 我们小主同莞常在是自幼的交情
column6:
Yes, Lady Shen and Attendant Sourire
have been friends since childhood.

My Lady has been concerned
ever since Attendant Sourire fell sick.

column3: 莞常在病着该好好调养调养
column6: I hope Attendant Sourire is being taken good care of.

column3: 病人嘛 本该多照顾着些
column6: Of course, we all care for someone when they're unwell.

column3: 幸亏我们小主平日挑好的送去了
column6: Yet her palace is ill-equipped for the winter.

column3: 否则啊还不知道到什么田地呢
column6: Fortunately, My Lady has always been sending things to her.

column3: 这怎么好叫贵人操心呢
column6: Who knows what would have happened otherwise?

column3: 这都是我们内务府人的疏漏
column6:
How can we have troubled Lady Shen about this?
This is the negligence of our department.

column3: 回头 回头我就叫人补上
column6: I will... I'll have things made right in no time.

column3: 肯定是下面的奴才大意了
column6:
Thank you for taking your time.
It must be an omission of your staff.

column3: 颂芝姑姑 哪阵风把您给吹来了
column6: Aiyo, what wind carried you here, Madam Songzhi?
Don't butter me up.

column3: 翊坤宫的金纸不够用了
column6:
The New Year is approaching.
Our palace is short on gold wrapping paper.

column3: 我怕娘娘要包东西赏人用

column6:
Her Highness may need to prepare gifts.
So I came to get some in advance.
You should have told me earlier.

column3: 翊坤宫的金纸是最早送过去的

column6:
We sent golden paper to your palace before anyone else's,
and doubled the amount for you.

column3: 方才皇后宫里又拿了一迭去
column6: The Empress's palace just collected one stack.

column3: 剩下的还要分给各宫的小主

column6:
I'm afraid we have to share the remaining gold paper
among the other concubines.
Huang Guiquan,

column3: 我瞧你这差事怕是当腻了
column6: have you grown tired of your job by now?

column3: 一向翊坤宫要东西没有不给的
column6:
The requests from my palace
have never been turned down before.

column3: 既然缺 就先挪了有的用

column6:
Since you still have gold paper in store,
send it to my palace and replenish some later.
But...

column3: 哪配得上用金纸包东西赏人用啊
column6:
The lower-rank concubines don't deserve
to wrap gifts in gold paper.
Don't you agree?

- Here you go.
- Thank you, sir.

column3: 来领这个月的月例银子啦
column6: Oh!
You are picking up this month's stipend?
Congratulations.
Perhaps I misremembered the date.
I thought Lady Shen was still forfeiting her stipend.

column3: 黄规全我可是告诉你了
column6: Huang Guiquan, I've said what I said.
If we run out, don't blame Her Highness for her temper.
Aiyo, what a job it is.

- I'm frozen to the bone.
- Did you get everyone's year-end rewards?

column3: 总算内务府顾着沈贵人的面子
column6: Yes.

All thanks  to Noble Lady Shen,
the Household Department gave us the amount in full.
It's fortunate we have Lady Shen.
She also just had a lot more gifts sent here.

column3: 这下可以好好过个年了
column6: Did she?
Now we can celebrate the New Year happily.
Isn't today the 25th already?

column3: 也不知小主子的病能不能好
column6: I wonder if My Lady can get well enough

column3: 可别误了除夕晚上的合宫夜宴啊
column6: to attend the imperial banquet on New Year's Eve.

column3: 没事 方才江福海过来传了懿旨
column6: Don't worry.
Jiang Fuhai just came to announce the Empress's edict
that My Lady is allowed to rest in her palace.
She doesn't need to attend the banquet on New Year's Eve.
Isn't that great? We can see in the New Year together.
Exactly.
His Majesty and Her Majesty arrive.

column3: 皇上万安 皇后吉祥
column6: Peace and auspicious fortune to Your Majesties.

column3: 今儿是家宴 不必拘束
column6: This is a family dinner. Don't stand on ceremony.
Have a seat.

column3: 皇兄每回都说不必拘束
column6: I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 可是按照规矩来呀 还是拘束
column6: Imperial brother, you always tell us to ignore the rules.

(Yunli, Noble Prince Guo)
But no one listens or ever forgets the rules.

Only my seventeenth brother would say that.
He never stands on ceremony.

column3: 今儿不逃席 不迟到
column6: He's not absent or even late today.
That is a surprise.

column3: 今夜团聚守岁 臣弟怎么能迟到
column6: How can I be late for the New Year reunion?

column3: 祝皇兄万岁安康 大清国泰民安
column6:
I raise my cup to my imperial brother.
I wish Your Majesty and the Great Qing peace and prosperity.
Cheers!

column3: 祝皇上颐安百益 福寿永年
column6: May Your Majesty live in eternal happiness and longevity.

May Your Majesty reign for ten thousand years,
and ten thousand of ten thousand years.
Drink up!
This is fine wine.
Consort Fleur,
did you drink it up?
Of course I did.
Your Majesty is in a good mood today.
News of victory came from the Northwest this afternoon.

column3: 说年羹尧平定了罗卜藏丹津之乱
column6: Nian Gengyao quelled Luobu Zangdan's rebellion in Qinghai.
All the tribes and their livestock were captured in full.
What a general he is!
What a capable Great General!
Congratulations, Your Majesty.
Congratulations! Your Majesty can be at peace now.
Your brother did an excellent job.

column3: 哥哥在前朝替皇上效力
臣妾在后宫为皇上尽心
column6:
My brother renders good service on the front line,
and I will do my best in the harem.
It's our duty.

column3: 就是缺了几株冬日里的梅花松柏
column6:
Our courtyard would have been perfect
if it had some plum and cypress trees.
It looks brown and bare on a winter day.

column3: 小主若是觉得光秃秃的

column6:
My Lady, if you want to liven up our palace,
We can put paper-cuts onto the windows.
They'll bring a festive air.

column3: 那你去找些彩纸和金银花箔来
column6: Great idea! Can you bring some colored paper and gold foil?
We'll make paper-cuts.

column3: 剪窗花好 我去拿彩纸

column6: Yay! I'll go get the paper.
I'll go get scissors.
I'll look for paper-cutting patterns.
I'll go with you!
Come on.

column3: 娘娘 端妃宫里来请旨

column6:
Your Highness, Consort Honnête's palace reported
that she is having a seizure and requests to see a doctor.

column3: 今儿是除夕 她多晦气
column6: Today is New Year's Eve, and she'd bring back luck.
Request denied.

column3: 那万一端妃那里自己跑去请呢
column6: What if she sends for a doctor herself?
Tell the Imperial Infirmary

column3: 谁敢去给那个贱人医治
column6: if anyone dares to treat that wretch,

column3: 便是和我年世兰过不去
column6: they are standing in the way of Nian Shilan.

column3: 奴才明白 奴才告退
column6: Yes, Your Highness. I take my leave.
This is to Your Majesties.
Where is Attendant Sourire?
Attendant Sourire is still unwell.
I told her to stay in on such a freezing night.
Jinxi, let me have a look.

column3: 槿汐 这孔雀开屏栩栩如生
column6: The peacock you cut is so full of life.

column3: 哪里比得上小主的和合二仙呢
column6:
- So beautiful!
- Indeed.

column3: 快看 跟要活过来了一样
column6: It cannot compare to the Two Gods of Harmony you made.
Look, it's as if they were coming to life.
Exactly.

column3: 我不过随意想个样子剪罢了
column6:
These figures are from the fables.
I don't know what they look like.

column3: 可以剪得和真人一模一样
column6:
But I heard some people can cut out
the portrait of a person with paper.
Sadly, I've never seen it.

column3: 小主啊 眼前就有个现成的
column6:
My Lady, one of those people
is standing right before you.

I saw Xiao-Yunzi making a portrait of you.
He's hiding it in his sleeve.

- Really?
- Don't... talk nonsense.

Xiao-Yunzi, don't be shy.
Let me see it.

column3: 快拿出来看看 拿出来看看
column6: Let us see.
It looks just like you.
Xiao-Yunzi, you have gifted hands.
He does.

column3: 剪不出小主的花容月貌
下次剪个更好的再给小主
column6:
Not at all, it doesn't do justice to your beautiful face.
I'll make a better one next time.
It does resemble My Lady a lot.
But on the eyes and brows,
it also looks like Jade.
How can I compare to My Lady?
Come here.
Jade does look like me after living together all these years.

column3: 那我怎么半点不像小主

column6: But why don't I look like you?
